enhanced_by.reason: The hashCode method relies on the state of the securityScheme field, so setting this field is crucial for consistent hash code generation.
The hashCode method also depends on the state of the scopes field, making it essential to set this field before invoking hashCode.
Both hashCode and equals methods are used to determine object equality and hash code consistency, making assertions about one method informative for the other.
The toString method provides a string representation of the object's state, which can be useful for verifying the consistency of the hashCode method's output.
